title: Send Airtable data as tasks to Trello
author: tanaypant
readme: In this workflow, we'll automate the export of all the submissions which have a total score greater than 15 for a final review on Trello. The workflow will also generate social media assets for the organizers and add them to the Trello card.
readme_zh: 在此工作流程中，我们将自动导出所有总分超过15分的参赛作品，以便在Trello上进行最终评审。该流程还将为组织者生成社交媒体素材，并将其添加到Trello卡片中。
title_zh: 将Airtable数据作为任务发送至Trello
